relation.text: 1787 . My Dear Sir , Maria & I very heartily rejoice
was not written by Mary Dickenson . If you do not now
trial of them , tho ' I have been bilious from my earliest years
hope to be in Britain in the Month of July
joins me in every affectionate wish to You & Yours . Ever My Dear Sir Yours very faithfully Napier . John Dickenson Esqr . N o 2 Abbey Street KINSALE Lord Napier Febry 1787
